title: Lexo1006
author: Lexo1006
content: Hello I currently have two brand new antminer L7 for sale! They are tested and work perfectly.I am located in Canada (Greater Montreal Area ) however I am willing to ship to specific locations or do delivery  in local area mentioned. If anyone is interested please let me know. Thank you. Serious inquiries only !

comments.author: OliverC
comments.body: How much are you asking per piece and would you use forum escrow?

comments.author: a1 Hashrate LLC2022
comments.body: basically no one will buy if you don't use an escrow.What do you want to get for them?12k? 10k? 8k?

comments.author: Lexo1006
comments.body: The price is 25k each (negotiable). Please if you have a problem with the price listed, do not make any snark, inappropriate, unnecessary nor redundant comment on my post.  If the price does not fit your budget just move move along with your day and use the energy exerted here to find something that is cheaper, do not waste my time. I am sure you have better things to do. I am only dealing with serious and respectful individuals. Thank you

comments.author: ncsupanda
comments.body: Quote from: Lexo1006 on July 12, 2022, 08:45:33 PMThe price is 25k each (negotiable). -snipped-Is this 25k for each pair of L7s?
